channel.title: RAG on MookStudy
channel.description: Recent content in RAG on MookStudy

item.title: Promptriever - Instruction-Trained Retrievers
item.description: A review of the ICLR 2025 paper, Promptriever. In this post, I break down the core concepts, training methods, and results of a new retriever that’s trained to follow natural language instructions.
